meanings.def: in a way that is accurate or true, without any mistakes
examples: Students correctly identified 16 trees species found on their study sites.
If I remember correctly, he was still the prime minister at that point.
They reasoned, correctly, that she was away for the weekend.

meanings.def: in a way that is right and suitable, so that something is done as it should be done
examples: When correctly applied, fake tan is difficult to tell from the real thing.

meanings.def: in a way that follows the accepted standards or rules

related: if (my) memory serves me well, correctly, etc.
